description: Completely re-wrote the clean part, added more correct chords to the pre-chorus and mainly fixed some of the bass lines, enjoy! :)
title: Bloodstained Cross

description: I corrected the verse riffs for both guitars.  When I exported from GP6 to GP5 the file lost some tom flams but I hope guitarists will be glad to have the right notes in the verses!
title: Bloodstained Cross
